mapper.sql: SELECT member_email, member_password, member_name, member_nick, member_address, member_phone, member_birthday, member_type, member_status, member_reg_date, member_postcode, member_address_detail FROM MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(member_email, member_password, member_name, member_nick, member_address, member_phone, member_birthday, member_postcode, member_address_detail) VALUES(#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberNick}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberPhone}, to_date(#{memberBirthday}, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{memberPostcode}, #{memberAddressDetail})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET member_password=#{memberPassword}, member_name=#{memberName}, member_nick=#{memberNick}, member_address=#{memberAddress}, member_phone=#{memberPhone}, member_birthday=to_date(#{memberBirthday}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), member_postcode=#{memberPostcode}, member_address_detail=#{memberAddressDetail} WHERE member_email=#{memberEmail}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE member_email=#{value}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE member_nick=#{value}
SELECT member_email FROM MEMBER WHERE member_name=#{memberName} AND member_phone=#{memberPhone} AND member_birthday=#{memberBirthday}
SELECT member_password FROM MEMBER WHERE member_email=#{memberEmail} AND member_name=#{memberName} AND member_phone=#{memberPhone}
